verses.name: Ruth 3:10
verses.text: And he said, Blessed be thou of the Lord, my daughter: for thou hast shewed more kindness in the latter end than at the beginning, inasmuch as thou followedst not young men, whether poor or rich.

verses.name: Ruth 3:11
verses.text: And now, my daughter, fear not; I will do to thee all that thou requirest: for all the city of my people doth know that thou art a virtuous woman.

verses.name: Ruth 3:12
verses.text: And now it is true that I am thy near kinsman: howbeit there is a kinsman nearer than I.
